Html: Can I use it this component to access the Microsoft Access database?  Thanks in advance.

Sorry for the late reply, you caught me while I was on Easter holiday ;) The latest version does not support MS Access, however I have prepared the code to support it and I will check it in to CodePlex this weekend. So when I do you can use FluentData to access a MS Access database. I will notify you when it's done.

Regards,

Lars-Erik Kindblad

Support for MS Access has now been added and checked in, and its part of the new release (version 2.1) that you can download from CodePlex.

 

Regards,

Lars-Erik Kindblad
